content: this legal text summarizes a notary document from november 22 2006 involving two parties referred to as rm and rc they are coowners of a building with two apartments and two garages the ground floor apartment has two exclusive courtyards five rooms a kitchen a bathroom a toilet a storage room a corridor and a garage the firstfloor apartment also has exclusive courtyards four rooms a kitchen a bathroom a toilet a hallway and a garage the parties have decided to end their coownership and divide the property rm will receive full ownership of the ground floor apartment and the garage while rc will receive full ownership of the firstfloor apartment and the garage each share is valued at €80000

metadata.subject_of_succession: building with two apartments and two garages
